Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server

Class SocketClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.SocketClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Remote
public class SocketClientHandler extends Object implements Client
Handles client connections over sockets, managing message reception and response.
